participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Sophie is an energetic and creative individual who loves to express herself through music and fashion. She has a playful spirit and enjoys trying new things.
participant_1.background: my favorite hobbies are listening to music and playing video games. i love wearing skinny jeans and leggings. i'm a blonde girl with really short hair. my favorite shirts are band shirts and ruffle sleeves. i am rather skinny as i like to stay in shape.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Mark is a thoughtful and strategic thinker who enjoys quiet evenings with his dogs. He has a calm demeanor and values intellectual challenges.
participant_2.background: i'm single and with two dogs. i don't drink alcohol. i like to play chess. i am in my thirties.
